file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 72-30-01-07 - COMPRESSOR WASH/RINSE - CLEANING/PAINTING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL COMPRESSOR WASH/RINSE - CLEANING/PAINTING EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to wash/rinse the engine compressor. The engine wash fitting is installed on the front frame at the 4 o'clock position. B. These procedures are applicable to the LH and RH engines. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 72-30-01-100-801-A COMPRESSOR WASH/RINSE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 72-30-01 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 72-30-01-100-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. COMPRESSOR WASH/RINSE A. General (1) To do the task, refer to the instructions given in Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - OPENING AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - CLOSING C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 413 Lower cowling LH engine 423 Lower cowling RH engine D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY To connect the cleaning cart to the engine GSE 158 Compressor-cleaning-cart adapter wash fitting Supplies the necessary washing solution to GSE 179 Compressor cleaning cart clean the compressor E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 2 Do the task Engine nacelle I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Install the adapter to the compressor cleaning cart. (2) Open the engine lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400). (3) Install the compressor-cleaning-cart adapter to the engine wash fitting. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 72-30-01 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Compressor Wash/Rinse (Figure 701) SUBTASK 110-002-A WARNING: • DO NOT TOUCH THE ENGINE COMPONENTS UNTIL THEY ARE COOL. THE TEMPERATURE STAYS HOT AFTER THE ENGINE STOPS. • BEFORE YOU START THE ENGINE, PUT THE AIRCRAFT IN A SAFE AREA. MAKE SURE THAT THERE IS NO PERSON AROUND THE DANGEROUS AREA OF THE ENGINE. (1) Do the compressor wash/rinse procedure. Refer to the last revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Disconnect the compressor-cleaning-cart adapter from engine wash fitting. (2) Close the engine lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400). (3) Remove the adapter from the compressor cleaning cart. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 72-30-01 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
